VOYAGE ACROSS THE OCEAN...
this summer with Ocean Youth Trust, learning how to sail first hand and developing qualities which you can take with you to use in the future.
Voyage dates:
Sunday15th May 2016 for 5 days
Sunday 28th September 2016 for 4 days
Requirements:
-Aged 16-24
-Either study or live in Tower Hamlets or somewhere close to the Tower Hamlet area.
The voyages are
ABSOLUTELY FREE!!!
However the only cost is the commute to the port of departure,.
which is normally either...
PORTSMOUTH, POOLE, or SOUTHAMPTON.
